message.body: Can you ask grandma if she has a traditional or family recipe for canolis and if I can have it if she does?
Just called grandma and unfortunately she doesn't have a family recipe for canolis......but she has a few in her cook book if you'd like them?
She is looking for a recipe when she finds one you'll call her . When do u need it?
I don't need it until this weekend. Thank you!
